chapters.title: Chapter 37: Performances in SamaraChapter 38: An Old Acquaintance
chapters.info: Uno Nomesta, p. 599 (424)—A Shienaran officer who accompanied the Emond's Fielders away from Shienar. He is the one who gave orders to Masema in the past. He is missing one eye, has a long scar across his face, and has a hairstyle like the typical Shienaran warrior—a topknot tied together and the rest of the head shaved clean. He is allowed to see Masema now only because they were friends in the past; Uno did not give his life totally to serve Rand, so he cannot be a true servant to Masema. He recognizes Nynaeve and promises to help her.
